name: Little out of the planet
description:
We highky recommend downloading the build and playing on the .exe. If you want to just look at it, playing here is just fine.

"Little out of the planet" is a small videogame we created for the GMTK Jam 2020. You play on a strange planet which is terraforming itself very quickly and out of control.

But don't worry, using high technology stuff, our hero will be able to recollect enough energy to build a rocket and escape from this crazy place.

Credits:

  • Programming and design: Pablo Martinez Domingo.
  • 3D art and 2D art: Diego Sánchez Ramírez.

We don't own the sound of "Little out of the planet".
